title: Accounting: What the Numbers Mean 10th Edition c2014 Marshall
description:
Accounting: What the Numbers Mean, 10th Edition (c2014), textbook by David H. Marshall, Wayne W. McManus & Daniel F. Viele.

PART 1: Financial Accounting

 6. Accounting for and Presentation of Property, Plant, and Equipment, and Other
    Noncurrent Assets

PART 2: Managerial Accounting
